lines.text: Attendance at Board Meetings and at Annual General
Committee. The terms of reference of the Board
Committees are determined by the Board from time to
time. Meetings of each Board Committee are convened
by the respective Committee Chairman. Matters requiring
the Board's attention / approval, as emanating from the
Board Committee meetings, are placed before the Board
by the respective Committee Chairman. The role and
composition of these Committees, including the number
of meetings held during the financial year and the related

efficiency and effectiveness of operations, both
